content: gauge first 5 rnds = 3 in diameter one of two patterns in small red doilies the other pattern is starburst 1 450 yds needed to make both doilies see also doily no 2227 2 for a smaller version free-crochet link 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/starburst 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/doily-no-2227 3 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_doilies/small_red_doilies/
